Articles.Content: How does the Crew R&R Mod work? I've installed it the right way but no tool bar or pop up window's & nothing in the astronaut complex what's wrong?

It's a behind the scenes mod.   There are sliders to adjust in the settings menu, but there is no other interface or anything.   It just changes under lying game play aspects.    You might have to enable it from the settings, but you won't see anything different until a crew is recovered on Kerbin and they go on R&R.      And unless you know it's working, you won't notice the crew selection window has a more intelligent crew selection than stock, cause it just works.
